name: Agicent App Company India
tagline: Makers of famous HASfit App - Top App Creators
description:
Agicent is an App development company, chosen by high tech startups and established brands in last 9 years. We are app creators behind famous apps like HASfit, Wellcure, and Aiko & Egor.
We offer complete App and web development services ranging across - app design, app development, quick wireframes and App MVP, web development and we work on both fixed price or iterative/ hourly model.
Following are the major technologies and tools we use -
Native Apps - Swift and xcode, and java and studio (for android)
Crossplatform apps - flutter, react native, angular, ionic
Web apps - angular js, html, css or laravel with php
Backend - node.js, mongodb, mysql, oracle, MSsql
Front End - angularjs, bootstrap, HTML, CSS, Jquery, redux
Infra/ hosting - AWS, Firebase, Azure
Design - Photoshop, Sketch
Testing & QA - Jira, Trello, Appium, Selenium, Manual testing
 
We've worked across variety of domains in last 9 years, however following are some where we've worked time & again with more perfectness everytime -
Fitness & Health- Our most famous App HASfit with 1 mn users, ketoproject app, low carb menu app.
Photo Video Apps - Aiko & egor, Pregmo, Mybabybod
Elearning - TalentLMS, Questbase, quizo
Healthcare and medical - Wellcure.com, smartirx.com platform, medicalminder, healthyhost.
Ecommerce Apps - Zed axis sales, Kolaveri
Dating - lgbtqtie, deuces, hummingbird, hang
Food & delivery - Easypic, Food Truck nearby
Enterprise - pulse survey, zedaxis sales & service apps
Travel & tourism - quadlabs ticket booking, secret travel deals, hotel booking.
